title: Good Samaritan

fields.name: Aura of Kindness (x1, Charge 90%):
fields.value: Target a player, potentially including yourself. You will boost that player's Defense Score by 0.3x of your previous Evening score for the Night. This ability Rampages, meaning that anyone who visits your target will receive the same Defense Power boost.

fields.name: Sacrificial Lamb (x0, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Target a player. If they are hit by an attack that would kill them tonight, you will die instead. The target will be told that they were attacked, but survived. Additionally, if you die as a result of this, the attacker cannot use any ability that could cause a kill the next night.
